thread.title: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent expands Totalplay's triple-play offering
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent expands Totalplay's triple-play offering | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent expands Totalplay's triple-play offering
text:
Sept 14 Alcatel Lucent SA :
* Says is to enable the 'triple-play' service provider Totalplay to expand its IPTV service in Mexico through the deployment of its Velocix content delivery network platform Source text: bit.ly/1M6tB27 Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
